Question Text: Date/time payment issued by NORC or UoC
Variable Label: Date/time payment issued by NORC or UoC
Notes: Repeated measures associated with Round for display on study manager dashboard
Derivation Notes: If BioFin_UoCPayment_v1r0 = 1 then SMPaym_JointTmIssued_v1r0 = BioFin_TmPayment_v1r0, If HDPaym_PaymIssued_v1r0 =1 thenSMPaym_JointTmIssued_v1r0 = HDPaym_TmPaym_v1r0
